mapper.select: select c.*, t.teachCount,a.fansCount from (select count(*) teachCount from course where userId in (select userid from course where courseid in(select courseid from courseManage where cmid=#{cmid}))) t,(select count(*) fansCount from attention where attention in (select userid from course where courseid in(select courseid from courseManage where cmid=#{cmid}))) a,(select * from courseManage where cmid=#{cmid}) c
select * from userinfo where userid in (select userid from course where courseid=#{coueseid})
select max(courseid) from course order by courseid desc
select max(courseseq) from courseManage cm,course cs where cm.courseid=cs.courseid and cm.courseid=#{courseid} order by courseseq desc
